Posts.Content: Hi dreamthief, yes your right achalasia is a prob with stomach and oesophagus, don't get too much trouble with it but it is rare. I have one kidney due to an rtc as a 10 year old child. They did the predict tool. worst case scenario with just surgery and hormone treatment is ithink 73% at 5 years and 52% at 10 years. I am not the type of person that tolerates being ill don't drink as I don't like the swimmy feel it gives !!! never smoked had a lot of traumatic memories of hospital in the 70 s . so leaning towards no chemo.
